name: ConsoleComponent

fields.name: height
fields.description: The height of the custom console component in pixels.

fields.name: location
fields.description: The location of the custom console component on the page layout. Valid values are right, left, top, and bottom.

fields.name: visualforcePage
fields.description: The unique name of the custom console component.

fields.name: width
fields.description: The width of the custom console component in pixels.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the Metadata.ConsoleComponent.

description: Represents a custom console component on a section of a page
